body: Don't like how he was stupid enough to get hypotize. Still gets a good action. With all three girls, its a harem now.
Nice to see the villain get the tables turned on them.
Wot? Side ch2 MC blackmail her, now she turn the table... but man all side character is lovely (even though it is his sister)
Not a tsun, she was grumpy because of the past occurence, huh?
I mean, ch.5 of the black haired girl is still coming out next, so this isnt the end
How the turns have the tables. Glad that i followed thru those 2 below-meh Chapter to get this Happy Ending. Better than those cockstepping Ending on the Light net.
